definitions.definition: Unfavorable ; antagonistic in purpose or effect; hostile ; actively opposing one's interests or wishes; contrary to one's welfare; acting against; working in an opposing direction.
Opposed ; contrary ; opposing one's interests or desire.

main_definition: Unfavorable ; antagonistic in purpose or effect; hostile ; actively opposing one's interests or wishes; contrary to one's welfare; acting against; working in an opposing direction.
secondary_definitions: Opposed ; contrary ; opposing one's interests or desire.
